Dredging was defined as activity involving physically removing substrate with machinery typically to allow for safe passage of vessels. Units are in km2.

Dredging was defined as activity involving physically removing substrate with machinery typically to allow for safe passage of vessels. Dredging was summarized to soft bottom coastal areas within state waters. Data comes from Ocean Tipping Points (http://www.pacioos.hawaii.edu/projects/oceantippingpoints/#data). Units are in km2.
